author: sunilUIET
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is to make rereco GT (run3_data_relval) a default for the data WFs. This is a partial reverting back of PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40692

#### PR validation:

Locally validated with WF 140.064

@tvami @bbilin @kskovpen
title: reverting back to run3_data_relval for making rereco GT default in relval [13_1_X]
